CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description: The function is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) attacks. The regular expression used in the function can cause exponential backtracking on certain inputs, leading to a denial of service. An attacker can provide a specially crafted SVG string that will cause the function to consume excessive system resources, potentially leading to a denial of service.
